model.employeeActionHandlers

Class Sale

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.employeeActionHandlers.Sale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IEmployeeActionHandler, IEmployeeGroup

    public class Sale
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEmployeeGroup, IEmployeeActionHandler, java.io.Serializable
    Handles the sale of products by salesmen.
